title: US-donor cuts worry life assurance sector
CBZ declares US$10m dividend
description: According to group chief legal counsel and governance officer Rumbidzayi Jakanani, the dividend would be paid to all shareholders registered by the close of business on May 9 2025. “Payment is expected to take place on or about May 15, 2025,” Jakanani said.

title: Vast eyes new concessions. . . as Zimbabwe releases company gems after 15-years
Byo pushes for more air traffic
Think outside the box, entrepreneurs told
Econet wins big at ZITF 2025
description: Econet, the largest technology and telecoms company in Zimbabwe, also won the Best Zimbabwean ICT Exhibit Award, the Zimbabwean Exhibit with Best Thematic Representation Award, and the Most Experiential Zimbabwean Exhibit Award at the 2025 edition of the ZITF held under the theme “Industrialisation: Crafting an Integrated Economic Landscape”.

title: Khayah proposes delisting, seeks shareholder nod
